title: Most Disruptive Travel Startups in Asia
text: Most Disruptive Travel Startups in Asia   Time’s changing …. Something we all believe it and with the change of time comes great Innovation. With the growing knowledge and experiences, various startups are coming up redefining, creating and disrupting markets. And in between these startups, some of the best adventures can be found in the world of Travel Startups. Recently we can see that travelling has become a passion across the globe. Be it an adventure on the Himalayas or a gap year, be it travelling with your friends or a solo trip around the world. The thirst for exploring the world is never going to cease. This is where the travel startups fall in who has been making the dreams of many travellers comes true. Whether it’s about arranging the whole trip, hotel booking or your rides, everything is just there at the tip of your finger. These startups had made everything possible for the people across the world. They are the industry changers. Today, let’s learn about some of the disruptive startups and innovations. Thrillophilia With more than 2 million users on their website, Thrillophilia has gained a lot of attention among the people across the globe. Thrillophilia.com is Asia’s biggest online platform for adventure based activities and things to do. The company was founded by Chitra Gurnani and Abhishek Daga in 2011. Anyone interested in travelling and activities can book travel experiences across 15 Asian countries at an instant. Instant confirmation on your booking is the predominant feature every visitor of Thrillophilia is happy about. From home stays, rentals, attraction tickets to tours and activities you will find everything on this platform. They have 10000+ activities listed from 3500+ operators across 15 countries in Asia. Thrillophilia’s mobile app has more than 1 lakh active users. Their app has a good user experience that allows users a better understanding of their activities and tours listed on their platform. The company is based out of Bangalore. HotelQuickly The amazing HotelQuicly app was launched in December 2012 by Tomas Laboutka (CEO), Christian Mischler (COO & CMO), Michal Juhas (CTO), Mario Peng (CFO), and Raphael Cohen (CSO). This application features more than 20,000 hotels and is also localised to 6 diverse languages - Thai, Vietnamese, Japanese, traditional and simplified Chinese, and English.The idea of this app pops up suddenly when the founders were travelling for business throughout Asia. While travelling at the time you need to make a last minute booking and to make it simple and stress-free they came up with the idea of this app. This app has made it all possible for the people for that spontaneous booking which they had been always looking for. HotelQuickly is based in Hong Kong, while the operational head office is located in Bangkok, Thailand. At the initial stage of the app, it was only available for Apple devices and Android-powered smartphones but later it was made available for Blackberry 10 devices. Traveloka This Indonesian startup is another platform for people booking air tickets and hotels online with a focus on domestic travel in Indonesia. At the very initial stage the company it basically served as a search engine to compare airfares from various other sites. But later in mid 2013, Traveloka turned into an air ticket reservation site from which the users can book their tickets directly from the website. Slowly in March 2014, Ferry Unardi announced that Traveloka will be soon available for business hotel room reservation. Now, this website is available for hotel reservation and booking flight tickets in an instant. This company was founded in the year 2012 by Ferry Unardi , Derianto Kusuma , and Albert. Ferry Unardi came up with the idea after he was unable to book a ticket for Padang, Indonesia from the United States. The headquarters of this company is located in Jakarta. Pytheas Infosys Helping over 70 local travel agencies to automate with their product – TravelCloud, Pytheas Infosys has also set a very strong foundation. This startup was mainly introduced to make your business anywhere. With just an internet connection, a laptop and a few clicks, you could easily manage your business at home or overseas. Their product TravelCloud offers you a helpful approach to rapidly dispatch your online travel business and self-deal with your retail business. You can also get the benefit of included deals channels (web and versatile) to achieve a developing pool of online gathering of people. Pytheas is certified by 3 major Global Distribution Systems and is just one company in Asia which has been able achieved this. Pytheas Singapore office is also ISO 9001:2008 certified and has structured work processes in place to meet customer needs. Very Local Trip Founded in 2014 in Singapore, Very Local Trip is another startup which has gained a lot of reputation among the users. Very Local Trip is a marketplace that connects different travelers from different places around the world. Get the taste of all local experiences and activities in your selected city and books the best place for an adventure. Very Local Trip is a network of open-minded, enthusiastic people who really know their city and want to share with their visitors their passion of the local culture, food and alternative places in a different perspective. By exploring alternative places with a real local, you will discover the local culture as an insider, avoid the tourist traps, and get unique tips. Whether you are panning for a city tour, dining experience or an off beaten track activities, Very Local trip is just the answer for you.
